DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate longitudinal change tau deposition measure 18F-AV-1451 uptake time .
DOC.brief_title: Follow 18F-AV-1451 Scan Confirmatory Cohort Subjects From Study 18F-AV-1451-A05
DOC.criteria: Confirmatory cohort subject complete 18FAV1451A05 ( NCT02016560 ) study Current clinically significant cardiovascular disease , ECG abnormality , risk factor Torsades de Pointes ( TdP ) , take drug know cause QT prolongation Current clinically significant infectious disease , endocrine metabolic disease , pulmonary , renal hepatic impairment , cancer Females childbearing potential surgically sterile , refrain sexual activity use reliable method contraception Have nonstudy related radiopharmaceutical imaging treatment procedure within 7 day prior study image session Have receive participated trial investigational medication past 30 day
